# PyRETROICOR
Python implementation of RETROICOR

## Dependencies
**[Python 3](https://www.python.org/)**
| Package                                                    | Tested version |
|------------------------------------------------------------|----------------|
| [NumPy](http://www.numpy.org/)                             | 1.18.4         |
| [Nibabel](https://nipy.org/nibabel/)                       | 3.1.0          |

## Reference
Glover, G. H., Li, T. Q., & Ress, D. (2000). Image‚Äêbased method for retrospective correction of physiological motion effects in fMRI: RETROICOR. Magnetic Resonance in Medicine: An Official Journal of the International Society for Magnetic Resonance in Medicine, 44(1), 162-167.

MATLAB implementation from: https://github.com/mkassinopoulos/PRF_estimation

## Support
Please use [GitHub issues](https://github.com/htwangtw/pyretroicor/issues) for questions, bug reports or feature requests.
